org.stormgears.WebDashboard

Class WebDashboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stormgears.WebDashboard.WebDashboard

  • public class WebDashboard
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps the deepstream library to simplify use with the WebDashboard

      • init

        public static void init(java.lang.String server)
                 throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Initializes the WebDashboard class, connecting to the specified server
        Parameters:
        server - the server to connect to (i.e. Raspberry Pi)
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - If the given server URI is invalid

        Subscribes a RecordListener to be notified of changes in the table in a certain path
        Parameters:

      • subscribeRecord

        public static void subscribeRecord(java.lang.String record,
                                   java.lang.String path,
                                   RecordListener recordListener)
        Subscribes a RecordListener to be notified of changes in the table in a certain path
        Parameters:
        record - the sub-record to listen to
        path - the JSON path to subscribe to
        recordListener - the RecordListener to notify of changes

      • subscribeRecord

        public static void subscribeRecord(RecordListener recordListener)
        Subscribes a listener to be notified of any change in the table
        Parameters:
        recordListener - the RecordListener to notify (with the entire table) of changes

        eventName - the name of the event
        data - the data to attach to the event
